info.name: Recipe API
info.description: API Documentation for Recipe Management System

request.description: Retrieve all recipes from the database

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "1",
      "title": "Nasi Goreng Spesial",
      "category": "Main Course",
      "timeMinutes": 30,
      "imageUrl": "https://example.com/images/nasi-goreng.jpg",
      "ingredients": [
        "2 cups cooked rice",
        "2 eggs",
        "3 cloves garlic",
        "1 onion",
        "2 tbsp soy sauce",
        "vegetables"
      ],
      "steps": [
        "Heat oil in a wok",
        "Fry garlic and onion until fragrant",
        "Add eggs and scramble",
        "Add rice and soy sauce",
        "Stir fry for 5 minutes",
        "Serve hot"
      ],
      "createdAt": "2025-01-15T10:30:00Z",
      "updatedAt": "2025-01-16T14:20:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "2",
      "title": "Rendang Sapi",
      "category": "Main Course",
      "timeMinutes": 240,
      "imageUrl": "https://example.com/images/rendang.jpg",
      "ingredients": [
        "1 kg beef",
        "400ml coconut milk",
        "lemongrass",
        "galangal",
        "spices"
      ],
      "steps": [
        "Marinate beef with spices",
        "Cook with coconut milk on low heat",
        "Simmer for 3-4 hours until tender",
        "Serve with steamed rice"
      ],
      "createdAt": "2025-01-10T08:00:00Z",
      "updatedAt": "2025-01-10T08:00:00Z"
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Get a specific recipe by its ID

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "data": {
    "id": "1",
    "title": "Nasi Goreng Spesial",
    "category": "Main Course",
    "timeMinutes": 30,
    "imageUrl": "https://example.com/images/nasi-goreng.jpg",
    "ingredients": [
      "2 cups cooked rice",
      "2 eggs",
      "3 cloves garlic",
      "1 onion",
      "2 tbsp soy sauce",
      "vegetables"
    ],
    "steps": [
      "Heat oil in a wok",
      "Fry garlic and onion until fragrant",
      "Add eggs and scramble",
      "Add rice and soy sauce",
      "Stir fry for 5 minutes",
      "Serve hot"
    ],
    "createdAt": "2025-01-15T10:30:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2025-01-16T14:20:00Z"
  }
}

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Sate Ayam",
  "category": "Appetizer",
  "timeMinutes": 45,
  "imageUrl": "https://example.com/images/sate-ayam.jpg",
  "ingredients": [
    "500g chicken breast",
    "3 tbsp sweet soy sauce",
    "2 cloves garlic",
    "1 tbsp lime juice",
    "skewers"
  ],
  "steps": [
    "Cut chicken into cubes",
    "Marinate with soy sauce, garlic, and lime",
    "Thread onto skewers",
    "Grill until cooked through",
    "Serve with peanut sauce"
  ]
}

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Sate Ayam Madura",
  "category": "Main Course",
  "timeMinutes": 60,
  "imageUrl": "https://example.com/images/sate-ayam-madura.jpg",
  "ingredients": [
    "500g chicken thigh",
    "3 tbsp sweet soy sauce",
    "2 cloves garlic",
    "1 tbsp lime juice",
    "ground peanuts",
    "skewers"
  ],
  "steps": [
    "Cut chicken into cubes",
    "Marinate overnight with spices",
    "Thread onto bamboo skewers",
    "Grill over charcoal",
    "Serve with peanut sauce and rice cakes"
  ]
}
